document.title: IFA Dialog Video corpus
document.intro: The IFA Dialog Video corpus is a collection of annotated video recordings of friendly Face-to-Face dialogs. It is modelled on the Face-to-Face dialogs in the Spoken Dutch Corpus (CGN). The procedures and design of the corpus were adapted to make this corpus useful for other researchers ...
